content.raw:
I recently tried to use the thumbnail generation with Gazebo 7 and had to tweak a few things for it to work, maybe we need to push those changes:

https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/thumbnails%0Dgazebo7#diff

To make thumbnails work only with the explicit `-t` flag, this is probably enough:

~~~
diff -r 0a2d1b0e0e6b deploy.sh
--- a/deploy.sh	Mon Oct 23 08:12:41 2017 +0800
+++ b/deploy.sh	Tue Oct 24 18:55:59 2017 -0700
@@ -137,7 +137,7 @@
   echo "Not cloning the model repo"
 fi
 
-if [[ $MODELS ]] || [[ $THUMBNAIL ]]
+if [[ $THUMBNAIL ]]
 then
   echo "Generating a thumbnail for each model. Make sure gazebo is not running"
   ./tools/gzthumbnails.sh
 
~~~
